title: Loma Linda Market
description: A large, all vegetarian grocery store that is sub-contracted out to a group of investors by the Seventh-Day Adventist institution called Loma Linda University. Offers selections in frozen, dried, and canned food personal care items, cookbooks, nutritional supplements, snack foods, bulk food, fresh produce, a small bakery and more. Next door is the all vegetarian cafeteria Patio Pantry.
